review: We have had this product for over a year and we love it use is everyday.  We keep our digital movies on our iTunes account and can access them regularly.  My husband uploaded photo's to it, so when we are not using it, or are listening to the radio we have our family photo's displayed on our TV as a screen saver.  The Apple TV gives you links to Netflix, Radio, Hulu and several other apps automatically so it's a one stop shop for digital users who have multiple accounts .  The only down side is you must have an internet connection even to watch your purchased digital movies.
author: Busy Mother of Two

review: I had to write a review on this because i have seen people comparing Apple tv and the google chromecast player and some saying they are not much different. NOT TRUE. I purchased both for my apartment to have one in the living room and in the bedroom The apple tv is $100 but well worth it, especially if u have apple devices at home such as ipad or iphone. But u dont have to have it to work this.  Apple tv has so many more options then chromcast. If u have a television provider there are disney channel apps, nfl, HBO and more u can use. If u have an ipad or iphone u can turn on air play and use the mirroring option so everything u are doing on your device is on the big screen. Also it come with a remote but u can also download the apple remote app on ur device and control it from there that way u have a keyboard and makes searching for movies alot faster.  Now chromecast is good but only $35 because it doesnt have alot to offer. It doesn't come with a remote so if u dont have a smart phone u cant opperate this device and also only offers netflix and youtube thats it. Easy to set up but nothing fun to play with.
author: Kami Lee

review: My husband bought Chromecast after seeing a commercial for it, but we already have access to Netflix through the Wii U, and Amazon instant video since we have Prime.  Chromecast didn't do anything new that we didn't already gave.  We got Apple TV and LOVE IT!!! We can play Netflix, and ABC, HBO, Disney, PBS (for Downton Abbey) plus all of our other iTunes movies!!! So pleased with our purchase!!!
